id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-workplace-organizational-transitioning between jobs with care economy continuity
title: Transitioning between jobs with care economy continuity
description: Transitioning between jobs with care economy continuity
content:
Scenario: Transitioning between jobs with care economy continuity
    Given Aisha may change jobs during her young adult years
    And job transitions are stressful
    When Aisha considers changing positions
    Then the workplace_elohim should support transition planning
    And it should help her assess new opportunities through care lens
    And it should maintain record of skills and contributions
    And career development should be continuous across jobs
    And the system should support healthy professional mobility
    And care economy principles should guide job transitions
